what: You can't just cut off the budget now! We're way too far in the project to be able to afford that!
What's done is done, Claris. Your team needs to be able to figure it out from here.
I'm sorry. There's nothing more I can do.
You're going to regret this, Tom.
You will watch as this company falls apart, branch by branch, leaf by leaf.
And don't come crying to me when this place goes bankrupt...
